state CALIBRATE_DISPLAYS {

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY_DISPLAY : CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY_DISPLAY : enter / #123; TriggerCalibrateFrequency()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ_DISPLAY : CALIBRATE_RX_IQ_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ_DISPLAY : enter / #123; TriggerCalibrateRXIQ()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_DISPLAY : CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_DISPLAY : enter / #123; TriggerCalibrateTXIQ()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA_DISPLAY : CALIBRATE_CW_PA_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA_DISPLAY : enter / #123; TriggerCalibrateCWPA()#59; #125;

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA_DISPLAY : CALIBRATE_SSB_PA_DISPLAY

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA_DISPLAY : enter / #123; TriggerCalibrateSSBPA()#59; #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

SPLASH

SPLASH : SPLASH

SPLASH : enter / #123; splashCount_ms = 0#59; #125;

SPLASH : 1. do / #123; splashCount_ms++#59; #125;

HOME

HOME : HOME

HOME : enter / #123; clearScreen = true#59; #125;

state MAIN_MENU_DISPLAY {

        MAIN_MENU_RF

        MAIN_MENU_RF : MAIN_MENU_RF

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as MAIN_MENU_DISPLAY.(InitialState)

        MAIN_MENU_AUDIO

        MAIN_MENU_AUDIO : MAIN_MENU_AUDIO

        MAIN_MENU_CW

        MAIN_MENU_CW : MAIN_MENU_CW

        MAIN_MENU_CANCEL

        MAIN_MENU_CANCEL : MAIN_MENU_CANCEL

        MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE

        MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE : MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE

}

state RF_MENU_DISPLAY {

        RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN

        RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN : RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as RF_MENU_DISPLAY.(InitialState)

        RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN

        RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN : RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN

        RF_SELECT_100WPA

        RF_SELECT_100WPA : RF_SELECT_100WPA

        RF_CANCEL

        RF_CANCEL : RF_CANCEL

        RF_ADJUST_SCALE

        RF_ADJUST_SCALE : RF_ADJUST_SCALE

}

SHOW_VALUE

SHOW_VALUE : SHOW_VALUE

state CALIBRATE_MENU_DISPLAY {

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY

        CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as CALIBRATE_MENU_DISPLAY.(InitialState)

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ

        CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : CALIBRATE_RX_IQ

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ

        CALIBRATE_TX_IQ : CALIBRATE_TX_IQ

        CALIBRATE_CANCEL

        CALIBRATE_CANCEL : CALIBRATE_CANCEL

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA

        CALIBRATE_CW_PA : CALIBRATE_CW_PA

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA

        CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : CALIBRATE_SSB_PA

}

CALIBRATE_DISPLAYS --> HOME : SELECT

ROOT.(InitialState) --> SPLASH

SPLASH --> HOME : do [splashCount_ms >= splashDuration_ms]

HOME --> MAIN_MENU_DISPLAY : MENU

MAIN_MENU_RF --> MAIN_MENU_AUDIO : MENU_INC

MAIN_MENU_RF --> MAIN_MENU_CANCEL : MENU_DEC

MAIN_MENU_RF --> RF_MENU_DISPLAY : SELECT

MAIN_MENU_DISPLAY.(InitialState) --> MAIN_MENU_RF

MAIN_MENU_AUDIO --> MAIN_MENU_RF : MENU_DEC

MAIN_MENU_AUDIO --> MAIN_MENU_CW : MENU_INC

MAIN_MENU_CW --> MAIN_MENU_AUDIO : MENU_DEC

MAIN_MENU_CW --> MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE : MENU_INC

MAIN_MENU_CANCEL --> MAIN_MENU_RF : MENU_INC

MAIN_MENU_CANCEL --> MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE : MENU_DEC

MAIN_MENU_CANCEL --> HOME : SELECT

MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE --> MAIN_MENU_CW : MENU_DEC

MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE --> MAIN_MENU_CANCEL : MENU_INC

MAIN_MENU_CALIBRATE --> CALIBRATE_MENU_DISPLAY : SELECT

RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN --> RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN : MENU_INC

RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN --> RF_CANCEL : MENU_DEC

RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN --> SHOW_VALUE : SELECT / #123; uiUp = &uiRXGainUpdate#59; #125;

RF_MENU_DISPLAY.(InitialState) --> RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN

RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN --> RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN : MENU_DEC

RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN --> RF_SELECT_100WPA : MENU_INC

RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN --> SHOW_VALUE : SELECT / #123; uiUp = &uiTXGainUpdate#59; #125;

RF_SELECT_100WPA --> RF_ADJUST_TX_GAIN : MENU_DEC

RF_SELECT_100WPA --> RF_ADJUST_SCALE : MENU_INC

RF_CANCEL --> RF_ADJUST_RX_GAIN : MENU_INC

RF_CANCEL --> RF_ADJUST_SCALE : MENU_DEC

RF_CANCEL --> HOME : SELECT

RF_ADJUST_SCALE --> RF_SELECT_100WPA : MENU_DEC

RF_ADJUST_SCALE --> RF_CANCEL : MENU_INC

RF_ADJUST_SCALE --> SHOW_VALUE : SELECT / #123; uiUp = &uiRFScaleUpdate#59; #125;

SHOW_VALUE --> SHOW_VALUE : MENU_INC / #123; UIIncValue()#59; #125;

SHOW_VALUE --> SHOW_VALUE : MENU_DEC / #123; UIDecValue()#59; #125;

SHOW_VALUE --> HOME : SELECT

CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY --> CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : MENU_INC

CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY --> CALIBRATE_CANCEL : MENU_DEC

CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY --> CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY_DISPLAY : SELECT

CALIBRATE_MENU_DISPLAY.(InitialState) --> CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY

CALIBRATE_RX_IQ --> CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : MENU_DEC

CALIBRATE_RX_IQ --> CALIBRATE_TX_IQ : MENU_INC

CALIBRATE_RX_IQ --> CALIBRATE_RX_IQ_DISPLAY : SELECT

CALIBRATE_TX_IQ --> CALIBRATE_RX_IQ : MENU_DEC

CALIBRATE_TX_IQ --> CALIBRATE_CW_PA : MENU_INC

CALIBRATE_TX_IQ --> CALIBRATE_TX_IQ_DISPLAY : SELECT

CALIBRATE_CANCEL --> CALIBRATE_FREQUENCY : MENU_INC

CALIBRATE_CANCEL --> CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : MENU_DEC

CALIBRATE_CW_PA --> CALIBRATE_TX_IQ : MENU_DEC

CALIBRATE_CW_PA --> CALIBRATE_SSB_PA : MENU_INC

CALIBRATE_CW_PA --> CALIBRATE_CW_PA_DISPLAY : SELECT

CALIBRATE_SSB_PA --> CALIBRATE_CW_PA : MENU_DEC

CALIBRATE_SSB_PA --> CALIBRATE_CANCEL : MENU_INC

CALIBRATE_SSB_PA --> CALIBRATE_SSB_PA_DISPLAY : SELECT
